sentences: On 25 November, COP-6 adopted a decision accepting with gratitude Morocco's offer to host COP-7 and deciding that COP-7 will be held in Marrakech from 29 October - 9 November 2001 (FCCC/CP/2000/1/Add.1).
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
